programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Cartman acabam inundando um dos vilarejos próximos a South Park. Como resultado, a cidade de South Park é declarada em estado de emergência, já que todos acham que isso é obra do aquecimento global.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois dias antes de depois de amanhã

programme.title: Stan estava buscando algo "divertido e grátis" para passar o tempo e aceita fazer um teste de personalidade oferecido por uns cientologistas e descobre que o seu "nível de alma" é surpreendentemente alto.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Agora Stan é o novo treinador de um time de hockey infantil e tenta fazer com que eles ganhem tudo. Enquanto isso, seu pai precisa lidar com a recordação do terrível desempenho de Stan em uma partida há alguns anos atrás.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan quer saber a verdadeira razão para as crianças decorarem os ovos de Páscoa e o que ovos e coelhos tem a ver com a morte de Jesus. Para chegar à verdade, Kyle e Stan se envolvem com uma sociedade bizarra que guarda um segredo lendário.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um dia, os moradores de South Park acordam e descobrem que estão sem Internet. Randy descobre que ainda há Internet na Califórnia e junto com a sua família, eles se dirigem para o Oeste do país.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chegou a hora da corrida de pinhos em South Park e Stan e Randy estão trabalhando duro para construir o melhor carro. Enquanto trabalha no carro de corrida, Randy adquire um componente muito especial para garantir o primeiro lugar de Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos fazem um perfil de Stan no Facebook contra a sua vontade. Stan acaba ficando de saco cheio com os pedidos de amizade e tenta deletar seu perfil, mas ele acaba sendo sugado para dentro do mundo virtual do Facebook.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan sofre de transtorno de acúmulo de bugigangas e, juntamente, com o Sr. Mackey, aceita ser tratado por especialistas. Stan entra no mundo dos sonhos
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A vida de Stan está um verdadeiro desastre, tanto em casa quanto na escola. Enquanto isso, a obsessão de Randy com a comida está mudando tudo, e inclusive faz com que Sharon descubra novos interesses.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Ao completar 10 anos de idade, a visão do mundo de Stan muda e também suas amizades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan está tentando fazer com que sua vida volte ao normal e acaba descobrindo algo terrível. Enquanto isso, Cartman faz o melhor hambúrguer da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman lança seu próprio canal de vendas de joias na televisão. Isso gera um negócio bastante lucrativo, já que as joias, na verdade, são falsas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Butters é vítima de um bullying improvável. Agora ele quer conscientizar os demais alunos sobre os perigos do bullying e, para isso, ele faz um grande vídeo de dança.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O mundo está abalado pela recente notícia do uso de drogas por um ícone amado, e todos estão se sentindo perdidos e traídos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos tentam impedir que seus pais machuquem uns aos outros usando como distração o jogo Minecraft.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan fica viciado no mais recente aplicativo do Terrance e Phillip. Enquanto os próprios Terrance e Phillip não estão se sentindo bem sobre a fortuna que eles estão fazendo em seu novo jogo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Randy vê uma oportunidade de sucesso para a Fazenda Tegridade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes saem para caçar com Jimbo, o tio de Stan, e seu velho amigo vietnamita Ned. Enquanto isso, um monstro misterioso que vive na montanha os ameaça e um vulcão bem próximo a South Park está a ponto de sofrer uma erupção.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan tem um novo cachorro chamado Sparky, que ao que tudo indica, é gay. Isso vira motivo de piada entre seus amigos. Quando Sparky foge, Stan vai ao Santuário de Animais do Grande Gay Al e aprende algumas coisas sobre a homossexualidade.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Grande cruzeiro do Big Gay Al

programme.title: O avô de Stan está fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como não pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televisão um tanto quanto inapropriado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A tia Flo está de visita e dá um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, começam a aparecer alguns cadáveres por aí, e a mãe de Stan tenta fingir que não tem nada a ver.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Randy é o principal responsável para descobrir uma solução para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereção".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colégio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situação um tanto quanto incômoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Wendy termina o seu relacionamento com Stan, e para ajudá-lo, os meninos o levam a um restaurante famoso por suas asas de frango e suas belas garçonetes. Mas o plano não funciona e Stan se une a um grupo de góticos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forçados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, já que ambos tem ideias diferetes.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se encontra com alguns lindos animaizinhos do bosque, que pedem para ele alguns favores inocentes. Após ajudar todos eles, Stan descobre que na verdade eles tem um plano para trazer o anticristo para o mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Depois de receber um resultado inesperado ao realizar um exame de amígdalas, Cartman fica cara a cara com sua própria mortalidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Em tempos de aflição e grande desespero, um jovem de South Park decide manter a ordem na cidade. Surge Guaxinim, que se torna o vigilante solitário de South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O sonho de Cartman de viver a vida de um pirata se tornará realidade, se ele conseguir chegar à Somália.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman é escolhido para fazer os anúncios da manhã na escola de South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O restaurante favorito de Cartman foi fechado e substituído por uma loja que vende maconha medicinal. Enquanto Randy quer conseguir uma prescrição médica para comprar maconha, Cartman fará de tudo para ter de volta sua amada galinha frita.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman tem um ataque de raiva quando os tamanhos dos pênis dos garotos são colocados no mural da escola de South Park e acabda sendo enviado para uma terapia de controle da raiva.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Noventa e nove por cento dos alunos estão contra Eric Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman finalmente admite que é gordo e providencia imediatamente uma scooter para se locomover.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman consegue se infiltrar na agência de segurança nacional.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Token é considerado por Cartman uma ameaça a toda a humanidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos criam uma empresa na qual eles não fazem nada, e enfim optam pelo nome "The Washington Redskins".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman ganha seu próprio banheiro dizendo que ele é "transginger" claro significado de transgenero.Segredo de Randy é revelado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman foi diagnosticado com ansiedade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman ganha o concurso "Salve o nosso frágil planeta" e é anunciado que Kathie Lee Gifford viajará a South Park para entregar o prêmio a ele em mãos, então, Cartmam decide entrar em forma tomando as pastilhas de Aumento 4000.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: A Vingança de Ulzana, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Arizona, século XIX. Quando um grupo de índios apaches desertores, liderados pelo terrível Ulzana, começa a saquear e massacrar as pessoas que vivem nos campos.

programme.title: Sua Última Façanha, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jack Burns tem um plano para tirar seu amigo, Paul Bondi, da prisão. Para ser preso, Jack se mete em uma briga de bar.

programme.title: A Marca do Zorro, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Don Diego Vega é chamado de volta de seu treinamento com os oficiais de elite na Espanha para a Califórnia, onde encontra seu pai, o alcaide, deposto e o povo vivendo sob o jugo tirano dos espanhóis.

programme.title: Ainda Me Chamam Campo Santo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Os irmãos McIntire tiveram uma educação primorosa na Inglaterra, graças às riquezas que a fazenda de seu velho pai proporcionou.

programme.title: Mato Em Nome Da Lei, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: O rancheiro Vincent Bronson e seus vaqueiros causam destruição na cidade de Bannock durante uma bebedeira. Eles disparam a esmo e acabam por, sem saberem, matar um lojista.

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax é um assaltante de banco que foi traído e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de prisão.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Crime)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Crime)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: A Maldição de Humpty Dumpty, (2021, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma mulher mais velha com demência se reencontra com uma boneca de seu passado. Em pouco tempo, ela começa a lembrar que esta boneca tem um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Lenda Do Homem Lagarto, (2023, Monsters)
programme.desc: Um grupo de jovens descobre que o Homem Lagarto não é um mito enquanto luta pela sobrevivência.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While training in the Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto rescues three men from the rapids who have come to request a mission.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raiga and Ranmaru use their Hidden Mist Jutsu to conceal themselves in Katabami Gold Mine, where even Neji’s Byakugan cannot detect them.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Kurosuki Family is dispersed, and peace returns to Katabami Gold Mine.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raiga comes back to life, only to see Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raiga’s attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: Black Cop, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A black police officer is pushed to the edge, taking out his frustrations on the privileged community he's sworn to protect.

programme.title: Undisputed, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: Seven friends, recent college graduates, are searching for a place in the real world, as they face issues of career and commitment. Rating: R

programme.title: Indecent Proposal, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.title: LOL, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Anne (Demi Moore) deals with life as a working mother and raising her teen, Lola, (Miley Cyrus) who seems to be growing up faster than expected.

programme.title: The Joneses (2009), (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: A picture-perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood and immediately becomes the toast of the town, loved and envied by all. It s all marketing…

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Air Force One, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When Russian neo-nationalists hijack Air Force One, the world's most secure aircraft, the President is faced with the decision to give in to terrorist demands or sacrifice the country's dignity and the lives of his wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: The Kentucky Fried Movie, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Series of short, highly irreverent, and quite often tasteless skits.

programme.title: Bobbie Jo And The Outlaw, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: A stunning carhop who wants to be a country singer and her sweetheart who dreams he's Billy the Kid become involved in robbery and murder.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage god’s ark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up a giant beanstalk on a mission to settle the score with Eneru! Elsewhere, the people of Skypiea feel the jolt of god’s wrath!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capriccio for despair! The impending doom of sky island!

programme.title: A flashback offers a glimpse at the lives of two legendary figures in Skypiea’s history: Montblanc Noland and the ferocious warrior Kalgara!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Led by a bell's sound! Tale of the great warrior and the explorer!

programme.title: The look back at the legend of Montblanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship – and then lost it just as quickly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Free from the spell! The great warrior sheds tears!

programme.title: Montblanc Noland and the warrior Kalgara succeed in settling their difference before parting ways, but the laws of nature and man conspire to keep them apart – permanently!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal friends! The vowed bell echoes across the mighty seas!

programme.title: Eneru strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy continues his heroic climb up the giant beanstalk. The rubber-man refuses to stop until he rings the golden bell – no matter what the cost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Angel island obliterated! The horror of the raigo's advent!

programme.title: While Eneru continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with god. Zoro’s at the center of the scheme, but he might not survive his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Knock over giant jack! Last hope for escape!

programme.title: Nami’s quick thinking gets Luffy closer to god, and the Straw Hat captain launches himself into the center of a sinister storm! Can he find a way to destroy Eneru’s looming cloud of death?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miracle on skypiea! The love song heard in the clouds!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Luffy’s epic battle with Eneru, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The battle ends! Proud fantasia echoes far!

programme.title: Robin attempts to decipher the riddle of a mysterious poneglyph, Usopp barters with the locals, and Luffy raids the priceless treasures of the legendary city of gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I made it here! The yarn the poneglyphs spin!

programme.title: With a little help from their new friends – and a giant octopus – the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the deep blue sea. Where they’ll land is anyone’s guess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the blue sea! A heartfelt finale!

programme.title: After a frightening fall from the clouds, the Straw Hats find themselves trapped inside an impenetrable Marine stronghold. The crew gets separated, the Going Merry is impounded, and rumors of ghosts run rampant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A state of emergency is issued! A notorious pirate ship has infiltrated!

programme.title: While Nami searches for the Going Merry, Luffy and Sanji pose as famous chefs, only to end up competing in a cooking contest with a beautiful mistress of the galley!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji the cook! Proving his merit at the marine dining hall!

programme.title: Zoro is imprisoned and interrogated, and Chopper’s ill-chosen hiding spot lands him in the operating room along with a doctor who can’t stand the sight of blood!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy’s insatiable appetite betrays his true identity, and yet another member of his crew ends up in the brig when two Straw Hats try to fool Commander Jonathan with the same disguise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The marine's dragnet closes in! The second member captured!

programme.title: Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day – or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and sanji's daring rescue mission!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang make a break for the docks, and Commander Jonathan deploys armed guards in an attempt to slow down the Straw Hats. Only one thing is certain: somebody is going down for the count!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the hot-blooded special forces! Battle on the bridge!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are surrounded, outnumbered, blasted with tear gas. Taking a pretty, young doctor hostage may be their only hope for surviving long enough for a Merry reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through the seige! The going merry is recovered!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew were almost in the clear when Nami made a horrifying discovery: the Marines stole their gold! Now, the Straw Hats must sail straight into the thick of the fight to reclaim their lost riches!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The pirate ship disappears! Fortress battle, round #2!

programme.title: Usopp hatches a plan for a moonlit raid on the Marine vault, but Commander Jonathan is has a nasty surprise waiting for the pirates! Meanwhile, Sanji and Nami attempt to recover the waver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The gold and waver recovery operations!

programme.title: The extreme arrogance of a Marine special investigator clears a path for Luffy and company to make their escape! Unfortunately, the Straw Hats still have to find their gold before returning to the high seas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The one fell swoop plan! Jonathan's surefire secret tactic!

programme.title: The Straw Hats may think they’re in the clear, but Commander Jonathan has one final trap waiting to ground the Going Merry! If Luffy’s crew is to escape, they’ll need a helping hand – or eight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Farewell, marine fortress! The last battle for escape!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates survive and near-death encounter with some mischievous sea monkeys only to land on a mysterious island where everything is much longer than it should be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Great adventure at long ring long land!

programme.title: After a loyal horse and his recently-returned master are assaulted by thugs, Luffy is drawn into a Davy Back Fight with the Foxy Pirates. The Straw Hat captain never backs down from a challenge, but this contest could cost him his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A davy back with the foxy pirates!

programme.title: The Davy Back Fight begins with a treacherous Donut Race around Ling Ring Long Land! The Straw Hats square off against the Foxy Pirates in a battle to see who loses a crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 1! One lap of the donut race!

programme.title: Nami uses her considerable skill as a navigator to put the Straw Hats on the verge of victory, but the captain of the Foxy Pirates has more than a few dirty tricks up his sleeve!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Silver fox foxy! The merciless interference!

programme.title: Thanks to some foxy sabotage, Chopper has been lost to the enemy. The only hope for getting him back lies with Zoro and Sanji, but can they learn to work together in time to save the little reindeer?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 2! Shoot it into the groggy ring!

programme.title: Sanji and Zoro take a beating at the hands of the Groggy Monsters, but they won’t give up the fight. With a little luck – and some teamwork – they’ll emerge victorious from round two of the Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A barrage of red cards in groggy ring!

programme.title: Round three of the Davy Back Fight is a rip roaring roller derby! Chopper’s fate still hangs in the balance, and the Straw Hats have a huge problem: Luffy doesn’t know how to skate!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Davy Back Fight sprints toward a sensational finish, the Straw Hats find themselves on the brink of defeat! Luffy’s finally managed to stay on his skates, but the Foxy Pirates are notorious cheaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A seriously heated race! Into the final round!

programme.title: The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A devious game of dodge ball costs the Straw Hats their archaeologist. Now, they’ll have to win an unusual uphill race to reclaim Robin and avoid losing another crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown on the cliff! Red light, green light!

programme.title: Robin and Chopper have both been lost to the Foxy Pirates, and there’s only one match remaining in the Davy Back Fight! Luffy’s got a plan to get his mates back, but failure would mean the end of the Straw Hats forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The captains square off! The final combat round!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger throws down his guns to indulge his talents in the martial arts when he meets his match in the leader of a gun-smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Legend Of the Lone Ranger, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger of an ambush arranged by the outlaw leader Butch Cavandish returns to fight back as a great masked western hero - The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: John Wayne: Gold Strike River, (1934, Drama)
programme.desc: A tough guy and cranky friend strike it rich on a gold claim and become the target of ruthless assayers. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: John Wayne: Stagecoach Run, (1936, Drama)
programme.desc: A man runs afoul of the villain who attempts to cheat him out of a lucrative mail delivery contract. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: An inspirational account of basketball coach Ken Carter, who received both praise and criticism when he made headlines for benching his entire undefeated team for poor academic performance.

programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.

programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.

programme.desc: Minako and Makoto clash over their opposing views on love. Usagi takes the girls to a accessory shop, unaware that Petz and Calaveras run the place.

programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.
